Journal.Title: Clinical infectious diseases : an official publication of the Infectious Diseases Society of America

Article.ArticleTitle: Remdesivir Resistance in Transplant Recipients With Persistent Coronavirus Disease 2019.

Abstract.AbstractText: New mutations conferring resistance to SARS-CoV-2 therapeutics have important clinical implications. We describe the first cases of an independently acquired V792I RNA-dependent RNA polymerase mutation developing in renal transplant recipients after remdesivir exposure. Our work underscores the need for augmented efforts to identify concerning mutations and address their clinical implications.
